level.heading: "Recall" defined.
level.text: The term "recall" means the process by which the qualified electors of the District of Columbia may call for the holding of an election to remove or retain an elected official of the District of Columbia (except the Delegate to Congress for the District of Columbia) prior to the expiration of his or her term.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Elections, recall of elected officials, see § 1-1001.17.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-46
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-46, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-204.101.
